verses.verse: <S%H7121>"Call<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> is <S%H3426>there<s%> anyone who will <S%H6030>answer<s%> you? And to <S%H4310>which<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>ones<s%> will you <S%H6437>turn<s%>?
"For <S%H9213>vexation<s%> <S%H2026>slays<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H191>man,<s%> And <S%H7068>anger<s%> <S%H4191>kills<s%> the <S%H6601>simple.<s%>
"I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H8327>taking<s%> <S%H8327>root,<s%> And I <S%H6895>cursed<s%> his <S%H5116>abode<s%> <S%H6597>immediately.<s%>
"His <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3468>safety,<s%> They are even <S%H1792>oppressed<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H369>Neither<s%> is <S%H369>there<s%> a <S%H5337>deliverer.<s%>

"His <S%H7105>harvest<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H398>devour,<s%> And <S%H3947>take<s%> it to a [place of] <S%H6791>thorns;<s%> And the <S%H6782>schemer<s%> is <S%H7602>eager<s%> for their <S%H2428>wealth.<s%>
"For <S%H205>affliction<s%> does not <S%H3318>come<s%> from the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> does <S%H5999>trouble<s%> <S%H6779>sprout<s%> from the <S%H127>ground,<s%>
For <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> for <S%H5999>trouble,<s%> As <S%H1121>sparks<s%> <S%H7565><s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H1361>upward.<s%>
"But as for me, I would <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> And I would <S%H7760>place<s%> my <S%H1700>cause<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%>
Who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H369>unsearchable<s%> <S%H2714><s%> <S%H2714>things,<s%> <S%H6381>Wonders<s%> <S%H5704>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557>number.<s%>
"He <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> on the <S%H2351>fields,<s%>
So that He <S%H7760>sets<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%> those who are <S%H8217>lowly,<s%> And those who <S%H6937>mourn<s%> are <S%H7682>lifted<s%> to <S%H3468>safety.<s%>
"He <S%H6565>frustrates<s%> the <S%H4284>plotting<s%> of the <S%H6175>shrewd,<s%> So that their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6213>attain<s%> <S%H8454>success.<s%>
"He <S%H3920>captures<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> by their own <S%H6193>shrewdness<s%> And the <S%H6098>advice<s%> of the <S%H6617>cunning<s%> is <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H4116>thwarted.<s%>
"By <S%H3119>day<s%> they <S%H6298>meet<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> And <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%> as in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
"But He <S%H3467>saves<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2389>mighty.<s%>
"So the <S%H1800>helpless<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> <S%H8615>hope,<s%> And <S%H9390>unrighteousness<s%> must <S%H7092>shut<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> how <S%H835>happy<s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> whom <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H3198>reproves,<s%> So do not <S%H3988>despise<s%> the <S%H4148>discipline<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
"For He <S%H3510>inflicts<s%> <S%H3510>pain,<s%> and <S%H2280>gives<s%> <S%H2280>relief;<s%> He <S%H4272>wounds,<s%> and His <S%H3027>hands<s%> [also] <S%H7495>heal.<s%>
"From <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%> He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you, Even in <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> will not <S%H5060>touch<s%> you.
"In <S%H7458>famine<s%> He will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you from <S%H4194>death,<s%> And in <S%H4421>war<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

"You will be <S%H2244>hidden<s%> from the <S%H7752>scourge<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> will you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7701>violence<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H935>comes.<s%>
"You will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H7701>violence<s%> and <S%H3720>famine,<s%> <S%H408>Neither<s%> will you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H776>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beasts.<s%>
"For you will be in <S%H1285>league<s%> with the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> And the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will be at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with you.
"And you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H168>tent<s%> is <S%H7965>secure,<s%> For you will <S%H6485>visit<s%> your <S%H5116>abode<s%> and <S%H2398>fear<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2398>loss.<s%>
"You will <S%H3045>know<s%> also that your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> will be <S%H7227>many,<s%> And your <S%H6631>offspring<s%> as the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
"You will <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H3624>full<s%> <S%H3624>vigor,<s%> Like the <S%H5927>stacking<s%> of <S%H1430>grain<s%> in its <S%H6256>season.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> we have <S%H2713>investigated<s%> it, <S%H3651>thus<s%> it is; <S%H8085>Hear<s%> it, and <S%H3045>know<s%> for yourself."
